feed.title: Montreal River Harbour - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Montreal River Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:23 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -5.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 5:00 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -5.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -10.3°C
Wind: SW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Snow beginning overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:32 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:32 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:32 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:32 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
